name: ai-code-review
description: AI-powered code review service using Ollama and LLaMA

scripts.ollama:pull: docker-compose exec ollama ollama pull llama3.2:1b
scripts.ollama:pull:large: docker-compose exec ollama ollama pull llama3
scripts.ollama:test: docker-compose exec ollama ollama run llama3.2:1b 'Hello, test message'
scripts.setup: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up && npm run ollama:pull
scripts.setup:full: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up && npm run ollama:pull:large
scripts.reset: npm run docker:down && docker volume rm code-review_ollama_models && npm run setup
scripts.clean:all: docker-compose down && docker system prune -af && docker volume prune -f
